DOC.brief_title: Circular Cyclocoagulation Using HIFU With EYEOP1 Device Glaucoma Patients
DOC.criteria: Primary Openangle glaucoma include pseudoexfoliative glaucoma pigmentary glaucoma IOP > 21 mm Hg glaucoma medication , indicate filter glaucoma surgery Patient must age 18 year No previous cyclophotocoagulation procedure eye No previous laser treatment eye 3 month HIFU procedure History previous glaucoma surgery implantation glaucoma drainage device study eye History ocular retrobulbar tumor retinal detachment , choroidal hemorrhage detachment Ocular infectious diseasee within 14 day HIFU procedure
